Item.ObtainDescription: Found in stone walls and crafted in a Furnace from logs
Grown from cotton or sheared from alpaca

Item.Name: hide
Item.ObtainDescription: Cut from animals at a Butcher Shop
Grown in a farm or foraged from trees

Item.Name: meat
Item.ObtainDescription: Cut from animals at a Butcher Shop

Item.Name: bone
Item.ObtainDescription: Taken from animals at a Butcher Shop

Item.Name: skull
Item.ObtainDescription: Taken from animals at a Butcher's workshop

Item.Name: puzzle box
Item.Description: [AN_ITEM_NAME]. It is actually impossible to open.

Item.Name: coin
Item.Description: [AN_ITEM_NAME]. Celebrate the occasion with a coin.

Item.Name: statuette
Item.Description: [AN_ITEM_NAME]. Exactly like a statue but smaller.

Item.Name: axle
Item.Description: [AN_ITEM_NAME]. Used to connect mechanisms in a straight line.

Item.Name: gearbox
Item.Description: [AN_ITEM_NAME]. Used to connect mechanisms at different angles.

Item.Name: mechanical wall
Item.Description: [AN_ITEM_NAME]. Converts to a wall when power is provided.

Item.Name: hatch
Item.Description: [AN_ITEM_NAME]. Converts to a floor when power is provided.

Item.Name: spike trap
Item.Description: [AN_ITEM_NAME]. It needs to be reset after being triggered.

Item.Name: blade trap
Item.Description: [AN_ITEM_NAME]. It needs to be reset after being triggered.

Item.Name: chair
Item.ObtainDescription: Crafted at a Crude Workbench or a Carpenter's workshop

Item.Name: torch
Item.Description: [AN_ITEM_NAME]. Provides light when placed or held.

Item.Name: workbench
Item.ObtainDescription: Crafted at a Crude Workbench or a Carpenter's workshop

Item.Name: chisel
Item.ObtainDescription: Crafted at a Crude Workbench or a Stonemason's workshop
Grown in a farm or foraged underground
